title: Amazon projects 50% boost to capital spending this year to $200 billion, shares tumble
description: It is the latest sign that Big Tech will not be hitting the brakes any time soon on hefty AI investments. Amazon shares closed down 4.4% during regular trading as worries deepened about the enormous cost of the artificial-intelligence boom.

title: Anthropic unveils new AI model Claude Opus 4.6 as OpenAI rivalry heats up
description: Anthropic on Thursday released its latest high-performing artificial intelligence model, escalating its challenge to OpenAI in the intensifying AI race. OpenAI is not taking the challenge lying down, and on Thursday released its own business-focused product, a platform for AI agents called Frontier.

title: Amazon sees 50% boost to capital spending this year, shares tumble
description: In a bold strategy to enhance its foothold in artificial intelligence, Amazon is ramping up its investments significantly. This initiative is designed to strengthen its AI prowess against competitors in the market. Despite this ambitious plan, the company's stock experienced a slight decline immediately after the announcement.

title: Is AI making degrees obsolete in 2026? What UK higher education says
description: As artificial intelligence reshapes jobs and skill demands accelerate, students are rethinking how higher education prepares them for work. This story examines the skills that will matter most in 2026 and how UK universities are adapting to build career-ready graduates.
content: By now, it is clear that the global job market is not simply evolving; it is undergoing a structural rewrite. AI is reshaping workflows, demographic shifts are widening skill shortages, and employers are demanding capabilities that were barely discus... [5868 chars]

title: Dan Ives names 5 stocks to buy amid software 'Armageddon'
description: Software stocks have struggled this year as investors worry that artificial intelligence tools will make the group's "software-as-a-service" offerings obsolete.
content:

title: AI Race Sends Big Tech’s Capital Spending to Stratospheric High
description: Four of the biggest US technology companies together have forecast capital expenditures that will reach about $650 billion in 2026 — a mind-boggling tide of cash earmarked for new data centers and the long list of equipment needed to make them tick, including artificial intelligence chips, networking cables and backup generators.

title: Amazon shares tumble as $200B AI spending spree rattles investors
description: Amazon on Thursday projected a surge of more than 50% in capital expenditures this year, joining its peers in a spending spree to build out artificial-intelligence infrastructure, and sending its shares down 9% in after-hours trading.
